name: Romantic Red Roses
description: A classic bouquet of one dozen long-stemmed red roses, perfect for expressing love and passion.

name: Sunny Day Sunflower Mix
description: A cheerful arrangement featuring bright sunflowers, yellow daisies, and solidago in a rustic vase.

name: Elegant White Lilies
description: Stunning white oriental lilies and lush green foliage, symbolizing purity and sympathy.

name: Spring Tulip Basket
description: A mix of vibrant colored tulips presented in a charming wicker basket, ideal for Easter or Mother's Day.

name: Wild Dandelion Wishes
description: A whimsical, hand-tied bunch of fresh dandelions and baby's breath, perfect for a casual, joyful gift.

name: Tropical Paradise Arrangement
description: Exotic birds of paradise, anthuriums, and green foliage for a vibrant, bold centerpiece.

name: Pastel Peony Dream
description: A soft bouquet of pink, coral, and white peonies, accented with eucalyptus leaves.

name: Lavender Field Bouquet
description: Fragrant lavender sprigs mixed with white and purple hydrangeas, creating a soothing, aromatic gift.

name: Assorted Succulent Garden
description: A low-maintenance gift featuring a variety of colorful succulents planted in a modern ceramic bowl.
